info.title: NFD Management Service
info.description: Service for querying and managing NFDs

get.description: Returns version information for the service

get.summary: Get a specific NFD by name or by its application ID
get.description: Get a specific NFD by name or by its application ID

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: View of data to return, tiny, brief (default), or full

schema.description: View of data to return, tiny, brief (default), or full

parameters.name: poll
parameters.description: Use if polling waiting for state change - causes notFound to return as 204 instead of 404.  Should only be used when waiting for an NFD to transition from not-existing to being reserved for user to claim

schema.description: Use if polling waiting for state change - causes notFound to return as 204 instead of 404.  Should only be used when waiting for an NFD to transition from not-existing to being reserved for user to claim

parameters.name: nocache
parameters.description: Set to true to return a never-cached result.  Use sparingly and only during certain 'NFD already exists' UX state transitions.

schema.description: Set to true to return a never-cached result.  Use sparingly and only during certain 'NFD already exists' UX state transitions.

get.description: get price / carry cost to mint or rewnew an NFD (if existing)

parameters.name: buyer
parameters.description: Address requesting price. Optional, but important when getting quote on existing nfd that is expired. If expired, then owner can renew for base price, but if not existing (but expired) owner, then the price is reverse-auction format over 28 days.

schema.description: An Algorand Account address
Name of a NFD, alphanumeric only or emojis/alphanumeric

get.description: Determines if specified NFD Application ID is authentic

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Application ID of a presumed NFD to verify.  The API will perform a forward-name lookup of the name within the NFD to verify it points to the same ID

schema.description: Application ID of a presumed NFD to verify.  The API will perform a forward-name lookup of the name within the NFD to verify it points to the same ID

400.description: invalidAddress: invalidAddress is returned for an Algorand address that doesn't appear to be valid

get.description: Determines if specified NFD NFT ASA ID is authentic NFD

parameters.name: asaID
parameters.description: Asset ID of a presumed NFD ASA to verify.  The API will verify the found asset references an NFD that in turn references that asset.

schema.description: Asset ID of a presumed NFD ASA to verify.  The API will verify the found asset references an NFD that in turn references that asset.

400.description: invalidAddress: invalidAddress is returned for an Algorand address that doesn't appear to be valid

get.summary: Reverse Address lookup with results returned per address
get.description: Get the primary NFD for an address.  Must be verified address, or if allowUnverified is set, it may match against an unverified address

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: one or more addresses (algo or otherwise) to look up, maximum of 20 can be defined.  Specify the same query parameter multiple times for each address, ie: address=xxx&address=yyy&address=zzz

schema.description: one or more addresses (algo or otherwise) to look up, maximum of 20 can be defined.  Specify the same query parameter multiple times for each address, ie: address=xxx&address=yyy&address=zzz

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: View of data to return, tiny (name, owner, caAlgo, unverifiedCaAlgo only [default]), thumbnail (tiny + avatar), brief, or full

schema.description: View of data to return, tiny (name, owner, caAlgo, unverifiedCaAlgo only [default]), thumbnail (tiny + avatar), brief, or full

parameters.name: allowUnverified
parameters.description: Whether to allow unverified addresses to match (and only if its only match).  Defaults to false

schema.description: Whether to allow unverified addresses to match (and only if its only match).  Defaults to false

patch.description: Set an attribute in an NFD on behalf of a particular sender (who must be the owner).  Can set user-defined fields, or clear verified fields (except v.ca*)

schema.description: Name of a NFD, alphanumeric only or emojis/alphanumeric

202.description: Returns (as escaped string) array of paired values representing a transaction group to submit to an Algorand node. u or s for unsigned or signed, followed by the base64-encoded message-pack of an unsigned transaction (to be signed by sender/buyer) or a signed transaction to be submitted as-is.

400.description: invalidAddress: invalidAddress is returned for an Algorand address that doesn't appear to be valid

403.description: invalidFieldSet: You can only set user-defined properties, or clear verified properties

413.description: tooManyTransactions: The number of transactions allowed in a single transaction group (16) have been exceeded.  Update fewer fields in one transaction, or if selling, reduce the data within the NFD first.

put.description: Replace all NFD user-settable attributes with those passed-in, removing, adding and replacing on behalf of a particular sender (who must be the owner).  Returns transaction group of transactions to sign

schema.description: Name of a NFD, alphanumeric only or emojis/alphanumeric

202.description: Returns (as escaped string) array of paired values representing a transaction group to submit to an Algorand node. u or s for unsigned or signed, followed by the base64-encoded message-pack of an unsigned transaction (to be signed by sender/buyer) or a signed transaction to be submitted as-is.

400.description: invalidAddress: invalidAddress is returned for an Algorand address that doesn't appear to be valid

403.description: invalidFieldSet: You can only set user-defined properties, or clear verified properties

413.description: tooManyTransactions: The number of transactions allowed in a single transaction group (16) have been exceeded.  Update fewer fields in one transaction, or if selling, reduce the data within the NFD first.

get.summary: Reverse Address lookup with results returned per address
get.description: Get all NFDs which have been explicitly linked to one or more verified [or unverified] Algorand address(es).  Unverified addresses will match but return as unverifiedCaAlgo array.  These should be treated specially and not have the same trust level as verified addresses as they can be falsely attributed.  The caAlgo array is what should be trusted for things like NFT creation addresses. For reverse lookups returning multiple NFDs, the first result should be used.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: one or more addresses (algo or otherwise) to look up, maximum of 20 can be defined.  Specify the same query parameter multiple times for each address, ie: address=xxx&address=yyy&address=zzz

schema.description: one or more addresses (algo or otherwise) to look up, maximum of 20 can be defined.  Specify the same query parameter multiple times for each address, ie: address=xxx&address=yyy&address=zzz

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the total number of NFDs returned - automatically changed to at least be 1 per address

schema.description: Limit the total number of NFDs returned - automatically changed to at least be 1 per address

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: View of data to return, tiny (name, owner, caAlgo, unverifiedCaAlgo only [default]), thumbnail (tiny + avatar), brief, or full

schema.description: View of data to return, tiny (name, owner, caAlgo, unverifiedCaAlgo only [default]), thumbnail (tiny + avatar), brief, or full

parameters.description: etag

schema.description: etag

400.description: invalidAddress: invalidAddress is returned for an Algorand address that doesn't appear to be valid

BlueskyRecord.description: BlueskyRecord contains information about an NFD w/ Verified Blueesky account and basic info on its metrics

ConsensusRecord.description: ConsensusRecord contains information about an account that participated in consensus

address.description: Sender or Receiver Algorand address depending on request

Donation.description: Donation contains basic information about donation totals to specific addresses from accounts related to an NFD

fault.description: Is the error a server-side fault?

id.description: ID is a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

message.description: Message is a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

name.description: Name is the name of this class of errors.

carryCost.description: extra needed to cover MBR (if necessary) - price already includes this amount

exists.description: whether the nfd exists. if so, cost is renewal, otherwise mint (including carry)

inAuction.description: if nfd is in auction pricing for given buyer

price.description: price in microAlgo for 1 year w/ carry cost (if needs minted) added in. subtract carry cost for per-year cost

IsValidASAResponseBody.description: Whether NFD NFT ASA ID is for authentic NFD

IsValidNFDResponseBody.description: Whether NFD App ID is for authentic NFD

address.description: Address(es) to link to the NFD (must be able to sign for each)

sender.description: Address that will be signing the returned transactions.  Should be owner of NFD

algoOffer.description: Offer price in ALGO. Expiration time set prorated based on amount paid vs fixed per-year cost when years argument is used

reservedFor.description: Address NFD is being minted for if not buyer

years.description: Number of years until expiration, 1 yr minimum, 20 max, extending renewal date - sets price in multiples of 1 year

avatarOutdated.description: Whether the verified Avatar set in this NFD is newer (arc19) then is set into the NFD. This will only be present on direct NFD fetch and if true

caAlgo.description: Verified Algorand addresses for this NFD

currentAsOfBlock.description: Round this data was last fetched from

depositAccount.description: account wallets should send funds to - precedence is: caAlgo[0], unverifiedCaAlgo[0], owner

match-check.description: Not returned, used in tagging for response to indicate if-none-match etag matched

metaTags.description: Tags set by the system for tracking/analytics

parentAppID.description: NFD Application ID of Parent if this is a segment

sellAmount.description: amount NFD is being sold for (microAlgos)

unverifiedCa.description: Unverified (non-algo) Crypto addresses for this NFD

unverifiedCaAlgo.description: Unverified Algorand addresses for this NFD

NFD.description: NFD contains all known information about an NFD record

match-check.description: Not returned, used in tagging for response to indicate if-none-match etag matched

NFDActivity.description: NFDActivity contains the property changes made in a particular NFD contract update call

carryCost.description: extra amount paid to cover minimum balance requirements - add to price to determine total amount paid

currentOwner.description: NFD current owner - if set via includeOwner property

newExpTime.description: new expiration time set from minting or renewing

NFDAnalyticEvent.description: NFDAnalyticEvent contains a price history record for a point in time of an NFD

NFDAnalyticRecord.description: NFDAnalyticRecord is an NFD Analytics record in a time-series collection, with timestamp, price, and event data for that point in time.

match-check.description: Not returned, used in tagging for response to indicate if-none-match etag matched

total.description: total number of results, with data containing paged amount based on offset/limit

NFDProperties.description: NFDProperties contains the expanded metadata stored within an NFD contracts' global-state

avatarOutdated.description: Whether the verified Avatar set in this NFD is newer (arc19) then is set into the NFD. This will only be present on direct NFD fetch and if true

caAlgo.description: Verified Algorand addresses for this NFD

currentAsOfBlock.description: Round this data was last fetched from

depositAccount.description: account wallets should send funds to - precedence is: caAlgo[0], unverifiedCaAlgo[0], owner

match-check.description: Not returned, used in tagging for response to indicate if-none-match etag matched

metaTags.description: Tags set by the system for tracking/analytics

parentAppID.description: NFD Application ID of Parent if this is a segment

sellAmount.description: amount NFD is being sold for (microAlgos)

unverifiedCa.description: Unverified (non-algo) Crypto addresses for this NFD

unverifiedCaAlgo.description: Unverified Algorand addresses for this NFD

avatarOutdated.description: Whether the verified Avatar set in this NFD is newer (arc19) then is set into the NFD. This will only be present on direct NFD fetch and if true

caAlgo.description: Verified Algorand addresses for this NFD

NfdRecordResponseFull.description: NFD contains all known information about an NFD record (full view)

NfdRecordResponseFullCollection.description: DonationListV2ResponseBody is the result type for an array of NfdRecordResponse (full view)

match-check.description: Not returned, used in tagging for response to indicate if-none-match etag matched

metaTags.description: Tags set by the system for tracking/analytics

sellAmount.description: amount NFD is being sold for (microAlgos)

unverifiedCa.description: Unverified (non-algo) Crypto addresses for this NFD

NfdRecordinaddress.description: NFD contains all known information about an NFD record

match-check.description: Not returned, used in tagging for response to indicate if-none-match etag matched

total.description: total number of results, with data containing paged amount based on offset/limit

offer.description: Amount in microAlgo to sell the NFD for.  1 ALGO is 1,000,000 microAlgo. 100 million maximum.

payReceiver.description: Whether to pay the offer amount + fees to the account the NFD is reserved for.  Equivalent to 'gifting' the NFD

sender.description: Sender of transaction - needs to be owner of NFD

note.description: Note to pass along to the NFD owner.  Must be provided but can be blank

offer.description: Amount in microAlgo being offered to the NFD owner
Amount in microAlgo to purchase/claim the NFD for

TwitterRecord.description: TwitterRecord contains information about an NFD w/ Verified Twitter account and basic info on its twitter metrics

jwt_header_Authorization.description: Secures endpoint by requiring a valid JWT token.

jwt_query_token.description: Secures endpoint by requiring a valid JWT token.

tags.name: info
tags.description: The info service provides information on version data, liveness, readiness checks, etc.

tags.name: nfd
tags.description: The nfd service provides apis for creating/searching/updating NFDs.  All changes occur via smart-contract calls with the endpoints returning transactions to sign for submission to an Algorand node
